scripts.test:php:functional: export WP_TESTS_DIR=/tmp/wordpress-$WP_VERSION-tests-lib/ && export WP_CORE_DIR=/tmp/wordpress-$WP_VERSION/ && npm run install:wp && npm run test:php --BWP_Recaptcha:phpunit_suite='functional'
scripts.test:php:functional:stable: export WP_VERSION=4.3 && export WP_TESTS_MULTISITE=1 && npm run test:php:functional
scripts.test:php:functional:all: npm run test:php:functional:stable && npm run test:php:functional:3.7 && npm run test:php:functional:trunk
scripts.test:php:stable: npm run test:php:unit && npm run test:php:functional:stable
scripts.test:php:all: npm run test:php:unit && npm run test:php:functional:all
scripts.build: export WP_DB_USER=root && export WP_DB_PASS=wordpress && npm run test:php:all
